cnd1:6.2: maḷakassa → aḷakassa (^snp5.1#904 [Vatthugāthā]) | mūlakassa (bj) | muḷakassa (s1-3, pts1) | mūḷhakassa (mr), samāsane → samāsanne (mr)
cnd1:18.4: jinānaṃ hettha → jinānaṃ heta (s1-3, pts1) | janānañhettha (mr)
cnd1:40.2: puramāhissatiṃ → purimaṃ māhissatiṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1) | puramāhiyati (mr), tadā → tathā (bj) | sadā (mr)
cnd1:45.2: Pītaraṃsiṃva → sataraṃsiṃva (bj ^snp5.1#943 [Vatthugāthā]) | vītaraṃsiṃva (s1-3) | vītaraṃsiva (pts1) | jitaraṃsiṃ sītaraṃsiṃ (mr), bhāṇumaṃ → bhānumaṃ (bj)
cnd1:45.4: Paripūraṃ upāgataṃ → pāripūrimupāgataṃ (bj) | paripūriṃ upāgataṃ (s1-3, pts1 ^snp5.1#943 [Vatthugāthā])
